Verses: 1 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkum Dhesaththil Nee Poich Serndhu, Adhaik Kattikkondu, Adhil Vaasampannumbodhu,

2 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kodukkum Un Dhesaththil Nee Payiridum Nilaththin Kanigalilellaam Mundhina Palanai Eduththu, Oru Koodaiyile Vaiththu, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Thamadhu Naamam Vilangumbadi Therindhukondirukkum Sthaanaththirkup Poi,

3 annaatkalil Irukkum Aasaariyanidaththil Sendru, Avanai Nokki: Karththar Engalukkuk Kodukka Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittadhesaththil Vandhu Serndhen Endru Indru Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Arikkaiyidugiren Enbaayaaga.
4 appozhudhu Aasaariyan Andhak Koodaiyai Un Kaiyilirundhu Vaangi, Adhai Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Balibeedaththirku Munbaaga Vaikkakkadavan.

5 appozhudhu Nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Nindru Vasaniththuch Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal En Thagappan Azhivukku Neraana Seeriya Dhesaththaanaayirundhaan. Avan Konjam Janangalode Egipthukkuppoi, Avvidaththil Paradhesiyaaich Sanjariththu, Ange Periya Balaththa Thiratchiyaana Jaadhiyaanaan.
6 egipthiyar Engalai Odukki, Engalaich Sirumaippaduththi, Engalmel Ganamaana Velaiyaich Sumaththinapodhu,
7 engal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittom; Karththar Engal Saththaththaik Kettu, Engal Sirumaiyaiyum Engal Varuththaththaiyum Engal Odukkaththaiyum Paarththu,
8 engalaip Balaththa Kaiyinaalum, Ongiya Puyaththinaalum, Magaa Bayangarangalinaalum, Adaiyaalangalinaalum, Arpudhangalinaalum Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanni,
9 engalai Ivvidaththukku Azhaiththuvandhu, Paalum Thenum Odugira Dhesamaagiya Indhath Dhesaththai Engalukkuk Koduththaar.

10 ippozhudhum, Idho, Karththaave, Dhevareer Enakkuk Koduththa Nilaththinudaiya Kanigalin Mudharpalanaik Konduvandhen Endru Solli, Adhai Undhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Vaiththu, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Panindhu,
11 neeyum Leviyanum, Unnidaththilirukkira Paradhesiyum Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkum Un Veettaarukkum Anukkiragampannina Sagala Nanmaigalinimiththamum Sandhoshappaduveergalaaga.

12 thasamabaagam Seluththum Varushamaagiya Moondraam Varushaththile, Nee Un Varaththilellaam Paththil Ondrai Eduththu, Leviyanum Paradhesiyum Thikkatra Pillaiyum Vidhavaiyum Un Vaasalgalil Pusiththuth Thirupthiyaagumbadi Avargalukkuk Koduththuth Theerndhapinbu,

13 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Poi Avarai Nokki: Dhevareer Enakkuk Koduththa Ellaak Kattalaigalinbadiyum, Naan Parisuththamaana Porulgalai En Veettilirundhu Eduththuvandhu, Leviyanukkum Paradhesikkum Thikkatra Pillaikkum Vidhavaikkum Koduththen; Ummudaiya Kattalaigalil Ondraiyum Naan Meeravum Illai Marakkavum Illai.

14 naan Dhukkangondaadumbodhu Adhil Pusikkavum Illai, Theettaana Kaariyaththukku Adhil Ondrum Edukkavumillai; Izhavu Kaariyaththukkaaga Adhil Ondru Padaikkavum Illai; Naan En Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Saththaththirkuk Keezhppadindhu, Dhevareer Enakkuk Kattalaiyittabadi Sagalamum Seydhen.

15 neer Umadhu Parisuththa Vaasasthalamaagiya Paralogaththilirundhu Nokkip Paarththu, Umadhu Janangalaagiya Isravelaraiyum, Neer Engal Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittabadiye, Engalukkuk Koduththa Paalum Thenum Odugira Dhesaththaiyum Aaseervadhiyum Endru Solvaayaaga.

16 indhak Kattalaigalinbatdiyum Niyaayangalinbadiyum Nee Seyyumporuttu, Indru Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugiraar; Aagaiyaal Un Muzhuirudhayaththotum Un Muzhu Aaththumaavodum Avaigalaik Kaaththu Nadakkakkadavaai.

17 karththar Enakku Dhevanaayiruppaarendrum, Naan Avar Vazhigalil Nadandhu, Avar Kattalaigalaiyum Avar Karpanaigalaiyum Avar Niyaayangalaiyum Kaikkondu, Avar Saththaththirkuk Keezhppadiven Endrum Nee Indru Avarukku Vaakkukkoduththaai.
18 karththarum Unakku Vaakkukkoduththu Unakkuch Solliyirukkirabadi: Nee Ennudaiya Kattalaigalaiyellaam Kaikkondaal, Enakkuch Sondha Janamaayiruppaai Endrum,

19 naan Undupannina Ellaa Jaadhigalaippaarkkilum, Pugazhchchiyilum Keerththiyilum Magimaiyilum Unnaich Sirandhirukkumbadi Seyven Endrum, Naan Sonnabadiye, Nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaraana Enakkup Parisuththa Janamaayiruppaai Endrum, Avar Indru Unakkuch Sollugiraar Endraan.
